website_summaries.verdict: Comfortable gloves that complement dressy wear, thanks to the long length, but they aren't as practical as others we considered.
pros: Lambskin leather gloves that are lined with cashmere for a soft fit inside and out
Extra long: 10 to 12 inches depending on chosen size
cons: Strange, unpleasant odor that may fade over time
Fingers somewhat long and bulky, not ideal for texting

customer_reviews.title: Soft Leather
customer_reviews.text: The leather is very soft but the gloves do run very small. I used the measurement guide provided and ordered a size 9 (which is what I normally wear). They just barely fit but the finger length is much too short. Other reviews suggested the fingers run long, but apparently my fingers are longer than most. I've included a photo to show where my knuckles are when I bend my fingers. Will likely end up returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Sanford

customer_reviews.title: Elegant, beautiful, and warm
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! The lining is warm, the leather is soft and flexible. The smart tips on index finger and thumb work well with my iPad and my Android phone. I ordered the Emilion Red, they're gorgeous, but more purple than red. They feel good and look great, very elegant. I ordered these two years ago but got them wet, so I had to order a new pair. Luckily, the price is fair. This time I'm going to waterproof them!
customer_reviews.author: Avalon

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful gloves, but not for me!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a pair of silver gloves and these looked promising. They are a nice soft leather with a thin cashmere lining. However, when I actually saw them, the color is more gray than silver and they came up too far on my arm. I wanted the gloves in a shorter length to wear with a silver color down filled casual jacket. They also seemed very narrow and were tight on my size 8 glove hand. So, I concluded, nice gloves, but not right for me to wear with my silver jacket. I returned them for a prompt credit from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Dodger

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I was so glad to find these gloves. I've worn cashmere lined gloves forever, but in the age of touch screens, these are magic. They actually work better than my bare fingers which, to be honest, don't always work on touch screens. My only quibble is that the size 6 1/2 I bought was a bit large. It's my normal size in Fownes, so maybe they've changed their sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Mugsie

customer_reviews.title: ... wiping some snow off my windshield and they dried horribly. Also
customer_reviews.text: gloves got a bit wet after wiping some snow off my windshield and they dried horribly. Also, the stitching on the inner lining came loose after a couple of weeks of daily wear. Mind you, I have worn Fownes gloves my entire adult life so this was very disappointing. Further disappointment was that I contacted the company, hoping for a replacement pair, and heard nothing. Obviously the quality of the product and customer service has gone in the tank. I work in marketing and know that 1 bad experience can undo many positives and can be the beginning of the end of a lifelong customer and company advocate. Learn how to treat and retain your customers.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Coleman

customer_reviews.title: My favorite gloves -classy and warm
customer_reviews.text: I have several pairs of these now, because they are very nice. I get cold hands very easily and these do a good job while looking classy too. I like that they are long enough to cover up my wrists. The linining is a cashmere knit and is suprisingly warm. I have small hands and ordered them in size 7. 7 fits my hands well, but with each pair I got they were initially tight/extra snug over my knuckles. Repeated wearing has loosenedn them up. And again --- they are now my favorite gloves. Well worth the $,
customer_reviews.author: HVC

customer_reviews.title: Great for city commute.
customer_reviews.text: Best gloves. I have small bony hands. The fingers are always too long in gloves for me. The size small is perfect for me. This is my second pair. I use them in my commute to the Manhattan to protect my hands from the cold/wind. I have not had the quality issues others speak about. I’m not using them to do yard work! Lol I really can’t imagine them getting torn up very easily! I don’t know what these people in the other reviews are doing w these gloves, but they are great quality in my book.
customer_reviews.author: MyResearchMy2Cents

customer_reviews.title: Disappointingly Small Since Last Pair
customer_reviews.text: These used to be the only lined gloves that fit my Size 9 hands. I'm not sure they even do that anymore. I hadn't bought a pair in several years and since then they've moved production to China. As usual, manufacturers in Asia seem to simply not believe that people of European descent might really have such comparatively big hands (and feet, and chests, and hips, etc. etc.) and the product has "shrunk" during manufacturing compared to what the original specs probably were. I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Booknut

customer_reviews.title: Where's the cashmere?  Worst pair of gloves ever.
customer_reviews.text: These are the worst pair of cashmere lined leather gloves that I have ever tried on, let alone owned! I miss living in NYC where I could pick up quality cashmere gloves at Century 21 for less than what these sold for and no State Tax if under $100.00. I am keeping the gloves because I need gloves now, but believe me, I cannot even feel what is described as "Cashmere Lining." VERY CHEAP LINING! No plush feeling AT ALL. Worst pair of gloves ever.
customer_reviews.author: Viking Princess

customer_reviews.title: Yes! These are the right gloves for me!
customer_reviews.text: Love these gloves! I'm a tall gal with long fingers and nails so while researching gloves I look for reviews claiming the fingers are long or too long! These gloves are beautiful and fit me perfectly! I love the knit lining and do not find it at all scratchy as some reviewers did. I ordered my tall daughter a pair as well, one size up and a different color, yay!
customer_reviews.author: catbunting

customer_reviews.title: Good but tight
customer_reviews.text: Nice gloves. They are a little snug, but they stretch and retract with you as you flex your hand. Every part of the glove goes where it's meant to be, so none of that having the thumb stuck by the palm. The fingers are long which is good for me. I ordered a size 9. The color is nice. I got the Emilion Red which is more like a burgundy. Out of the plastic they smell a little bit like the whiff you get when driving past a farm, but it's the second day and already that smell is gone. I wish they were roomier, maybe going a size up would be a good idea.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Camporeale

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I am on my third pair of these gloves. I love them. I like the longer length as it prevents wrist exposure! I finally had to replace my black pair after 5 years of daily wear ( six months a year!) They handled the wet Oregon weather and snow of Minn. I did super glue one tiny seam rip last year but ordered a larger size this year which should prevent that stretch. I wish they had more colors..I'd buy more.
customer_reviews.author: megan p hornby

customer_reviews.title: TOO NARROW
customer_reviews.text: Lovely gloves, but way too NARROW! I originally ordered my usual 8.5. They were very tight on my hand. Returned them for a 9. Longer in the fingers, but still too tight in the hand width. I am keeping these, and hope they will stretch somewhat. These are not the Fownes I used to order by any means.
customer_reviews.author: Chicks

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for large hands.
customer_reviews.text: I have large hands and can rarely find gloves that fit. I was a bit skeptical of these and ordered them in an extra large. They fit really well and I very much like how pretty they are. I also like being able to use my phone without having to take my gloves off. Sadly I lost one of these after having them for about a month. I think I will need to order another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Prefer 2b anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money very cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: I am highly disappointed in these gloves I got them February 3rd and have only worn them a few times, tonight while putting them on they ripped. They cost way too much to rip this easily
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fingers VERY long.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this brand, style, size before. I am tall and have long fingers, but these are way too long. Have to take them off to get keys out, push garage door opener, etc. Also, after only a month the linings came loose from the leather in two of the fingers, but I managed to fix them.
customer_reviews.author: C. Plaia

customer_reviews.title: beautiful gloves, very soft leather with soft cashmere lining
customer_reviews.text: beautiful gloves, very soft leather with soft cashmere lining. I ordered a small and it is size 6.5. they were a teeny bit tight on the thumbs, but I wore them last night for a walk and they stretched a bit. there are lovely, expensive looking gloves. I like buying beautiful things that last. they do also work on a touchscreen, I checked. so, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: annabella

customer_reviews.title: The sizing factor is incorrect. If you need a Small, order a Medium.
customer_reviews.text: I found the product was very good however....these gloves were a Christmas present for my wife. she wears a Small size but when I gave them to her they would not fit. The sizing factor is incorrect. If you need a Small, order a Medium. the cost of the return shipping was not worth it and I guess I will give them to someone else who could use them.
customer_reviews.author: Wm. Howard Malpass

customer_reviews.title: Unstable product quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product on May 9, 2018. The inner Cashmere liner for right glove came off from the leather part by the end of May. Today is June 4, 2018. Liners in thumb, index finer, and pinky are loose inside the glove. Since these areas are too small to correct problems, my fingers can't penetrate the glove. It is my regret to write this review since my first pair I bought at a retailer was REALLY GOOD. I still have them.
customer_reviews.author: Torigasuki

customer_reviews.title: Must Have
customer_reviews.text: Love these gloves. They have a nice lining and keep my hands warm. I purchased these for the variety of size choices. I wanted a slightly larger size glove because the traditional 'S/M' is uncomfortable worn over my engagement ring, and I'm obviously not taking that off! I plan to buy another pair in a different color if it is available!
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Worked great with phone.  Lightweight and still warm!!
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves! I wore these in NYC and Chicago during 25-35 degree weather and my hands stayed nice and warm. For ladies with larger hands these gloves are great. I got the size 9 which was accurate to the sizing guides. And although they were nice and warm, they were still lightweight and did not feel bulky or heavy AND they worked GREAT with my phone. I did not have to take the gloves off to operate my smartphone , take pictures, use maps, etc. Definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper TK

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: The other reviewers were right in that these are very slim fitting. But I have tiny hands so I think they're great. I usually have a hard time finding women's gloves small enough, but these were a perfect fit. Nicely made and very comfortable and pretty. And warm but not like snowstorm warm.
customer_reviews.author: tourdm

customer_reviews.title: Lovely gloves that really work with your phone or tablet!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful soft leather, good fit, nice taper to the fingers, with the conductivity they claim. I was so pleased that I could still use my phone without taking them off. Cashmere lining is warm and just the right thickness. The length was important to me, too, so they cover the gap over my wrist when wearing my winter coat. Lovely gift, too!
customer_reviews.author: walpole3

customer_reviews.title: I love them. they are great driving gloves that keep ...
customer_reviews.text: These are the only gloves that fit my hands (extra large) well. I love them. they are great driving gloves that keep your hands warm. These also do not soak up water when it rains. British tan goes well with my Evergreen coat.
customer_reviews.author: Indy Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Black lined gloves
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are very nice. the lining is soft and warm, the picture is not accurate. They are not as long. Just past the wrist, which I liked better anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Mama K

customer_reviews.title: A class act
customer_reviews.text: I rarely review products unless I,m highly impressed, and I am highly impressed with these gloves. They are lovely looking, very soft and fit like a glove. I especially like the length to keep my wrists warm in this bitter winter we are having. I paid twice this for leather gloves at a major department store when the temperatures fell below zero here and ..well, no comparison. I salute Fownes for a beautiful, class act product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gloves
customer_reviews.text: Obviously I bought these ahead of cold weather so I don't know about warmth. They are soft and the lining is soft but very thin. Ok for where I live. Arrived as promised. Like them
customer_reviews.author: Edie

customer_reviews.title: SO GLAD I CHOSE THESE
customer_reviews.text: I went with the 7, though I might be more of a 7.5-- and they are perfect! The leather stretches. The cashmere insulates. They're longer than most, meaning my wrists are warm. The fingers are so svelte and adequately lengthed.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: The leather is beautiful, but not pleased with how long the fingers ...
customer_reviews.text: The leather is beautiful, but not pleased with how long the fingers are. I ordered the large which I could wear, but the three middle fingers were at least an inch too long. I gave them to my granddaughter who has nice long fingers and they were long on her!
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie R Leab

customer_reviews.title: This color looks nothing like the red that is shown
customer_reviews.text: These gloves fit perfectly but the color I ordered is not correct. I ordered RED and I got a rose red. This color looks nothing like the red that is shown. Not worth spending money to send them back, so I'm stuck with a color i don't particularly like.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit and feel.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several makes of leather/ cashmere gloves and these are the best so far. They fit comfortably and are quite luxurious to wear. I especially like the longer length which covers my whole wrists to my jacket. The electronic touch capabilities are an added bonus that I was not looking for but find very convenient. They are well made and I expect them to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn E.Frazier

customer_reviews.title: The lined purplish grape colored gloves are well made with ...
customer_reviews.text: The lined purplish grape colored gloves are well made with touch screen compatibility. They come about up the arm about 1 inch longer than most gloves. I bought a 7 which fits a small hand.
customer_reviews.author: On The Farm

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Plum Color and have women's size 9
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Plum color, fingers are long enough for me, wish they were a little looser, hopefully they will stretch with wear. I order size 9, I have long fingers no nails. Not many companies carry a women's size 9 and these were slightly larger though still smaller then their measurement chart
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Not What I Had Hoped For
customer_reviews.text: I did not know there were different levels of quality from Fownes gloves. I thought I was getting a bargain and in retrospect I wish I had kicked over some more greenies to purchase a better pair. They are just OK. Not very supple leather and not well shaped to fit my hand.
customer_reviews.author: K. Wingo

customer_reviews.title: Annoying, unremovable, infuriating tag
customer_reviews.text: Nice gloves but the tag will not come off without damaging the gloves. That wouldn’t be as much of a problem if the tag wasn’t so itchy. The leather has som gently give to it, and it keeps my hands warm... if I can keep them on long enough without giving up on the $@&& tag.
customer_reviews.author: Theoracleiam

customer_reviews.title: The gloves are well made and sturdy, and the cashmere inside feels great
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled to find gloves that actually fit my long fingers and wide hands. The gloves are well made and sturdy, and the cashmere inside feels great. They are very warm and comfortable, and the ability to swipe my phone without taking them off is an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: M. K. Tate

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice gloves. Fit beautifully and keep my hands warm in our cold Michigan winter. Easy to drive with and finger tip allows me to press screen buttons in my car and on my phone. These are my 2nd pair. Got them in red last year and those still look like new.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: I love these gloves.
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying these for winter driving and dress for several years. They do run on the small size, I ordered an 8XL and they fit snug, not tight. My hands are average size I think. They are warm and soft.
customer_reviews.author: echoesreach

customer_reviews.title: Although they DO NOT come up as high on your ...
customer_reviews.text: Although they DO NOT come up as high on your arm as the picture makes you think, so I give 4 stars, but they are past your wrist bone; I would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A very lovely glove
customer_reviews.text: A very nice and warm glove for the price. I was looking for a glove with longer wrist covers and this looked like it might go about an inch beyond my wrist but no such luck. It is a typical, beautiful glove. I won't return them because I do love them, and will just have to keep shopping to find what I'm looking for!
customer_reviews.author: RapidsLover

customer_reviews.title: That the item is like the picture and description
customer_reviews.text: The gloves do not match picture or description. Short gloves just over wrist. NOT at all like the picture
customer_reviews.author: Lori devries

customer_reviews.title: Really nice and comfortable gloves
customer_reviews.text: Really nice and comfortable gloves. Fit nicely and are really warm to wear out in cold weather ( which I have really done!) Love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Soft lovely gloves
customer_reviews.text: Love these gloves. They are true to size, are soft and are long enough to go beneath my coat sleeve. I weather proofed them to prevent staining.
customer_reviews.author: bo's girl

customer_reviews.title: Soft yet warm and phone/tablet compatible.
customer_reviews.text: Love these gloves. Have to order them every year cause I can never hold on to them. They are soft yet warm. Love the fact that I don’t have to take my gloves off to answer a call.
customer_reviews.author: Deirdre Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Quite snug as I ordered exactly my size. I ...
customer_reviews.text: Quite snug as I ordered exactly my size. I figure it will stretch. Alas, the fingers are long enough. This is the first women's glove that is long enough in the fingers for a 5'9" lady.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves!
customer_reviews.text: So excited to get these gloves as a gift. I have large hands with long fingers, perfect for playing the piano, but usually not for finding gloves to fit. These fit perfectly, are really comfortable, and I can use my phone without taking them off. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Wally

customer_reviews.title: 4th pair in over 30 years
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Fownes gloves for over 30 years, they wear like iron and feel like silk. I wear a size 9 and have no problem with the fit. The cashmere lining is wonderful. I have thrown them in the washing machine by accident and they came through fine. I went with the touch-screen glove this time so I must be carful about the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Sancy F.

customer_reviews.title: Love these gloves
customer_reviews.text: Love these gloves. I wear a pair every winter and I live in Alaska. Great glove and great price
customer_reviews.author: AK Dreamer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing! I looked everywhere for this exact color and ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing! I looked everywhere for this exact color and they match my coat perfectly! I'm so happy I found them. The quality is very good and they are warm. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: D. A. Haines

customer_reviews.title: Great for long fingers or finger nails!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice gloves, good quality leather, very stylish design/ cut, long fingers (yay!!) Considering the thickness of the lining they do not look bulky at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kath-a-lou

customer_reviews.title: Stink Alert
customer_reviews.text: These gloves look pretty but they stink like a skunk. I aired them out for a few days but the stench still didn't go. My hands started smelling as soon as I tried them on. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are nice gloves, but terrible if you want to use your phone while having them on
customer_reviews.text: Used to love these gloves. They worked flawlessly when I bought my first pair in 2016. I ordered a replacement after I lost them, and they stopped being touch-sensitive within a week of use. Really disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: JuliaBulia

customer_reviews.title: Read the sizing information carefully before you order.
customer_reviews.text: Finally found a pair that fits. Fownes Size 7 1/2, calfskin, cashmere-lined. Length just right. A bit tight, but much better than the Size 7s, and I think 8 would be too large. Warm, comfy, and attractive. Goes with anything.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia in DC

customer_reviews.title: I just love them
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of these gloves. I just love them and wore them all winter for 3 years! I'm buying a second pair as the first pair the lining is wearing out. I wore them daily so normal wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: marie musco

customer_reviews.title: These gloves are beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally write reviews, but the quality of these gloves for the price could not go without comment. They not only work with your smartphone as promised, but they look like gloves that cost 10 times the price. Thanks to the vendor for offering such great value for a high quality item at Christmastime!!
customer_reviews.author: SMC

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable and classy looking
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend going up one size. Especially if you live in a dry climate.
customer_reviews.author: CJM, Castle Rock

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These fit my large hands just fine. Both the lining and the leather are very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Very well constructed; Very soft leather - Good fit, high-quality. Would also make a very fine gift!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonfan

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Love the above the wrist length & soft interior of these gloves!
customer_reviews.author: Gidget Louise

customer_reviews.title: Great quality gloves!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the burgundy gloves. When you first buy, it seems they'll be tight. But don't worry. They stretch to fit your hands and look very chic.
customer_reviews.author: geer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love how soft the leather is, it feels just like a second skin while you’re driving! The purple is definitely more egg plant though.
customer_reviews.author: paula callahan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but my hands smell funny when I take them off.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, but my hands smell funny when I take them off (trying not to think about what that smell is). They ran a tad small I thought too, but they look nice and I can work my smart phone with them on, so that's a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Linda 60609

customer_reviews.title: Warm, but they smell funny!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and warm, but the fingers seem disproportionately long. They also have a really unpleasant smell out of the package. Like, urine. It's been two weeks and it hasn't dissipated. I am keeping them because it's snowing here and I need them.
customer_reviews.author: Quirkster

customer_reviews.title: they do allow me to use my smart phone while wearing them
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a pair of gloves that were a little longer than wrist length, and while they are a LITTLE longer, not by much. However, they do allow me to use my smart phone while wearing them, so that's good. It helps if they're tight, so consider ordering a size smaller than you usually wear.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Have the extra small size
customer_reviews.text: I have very tiny hands with short fingers. The size 6 (XS) fit me perfectly! No other sellers on Amazon had this size in leather with a cashmere lining. I had to go through pages to find them. It was well worth the time. I love the fit, the quality, and the price. So happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: vjmakjk

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Gloves
customer_reviews.text: These lined women's gloves are very good. First I ordered a size 8 thinking that would be large enough. Got them and couldn't even put them on. I returned the size 8s and ordered the largest women's size, 9-1/2. These fit better, but my right hand (with bad arthritis) is a tad tight. It seems to be stretching out a bit with wear.
customer_reviews.author: C. Maley

customer_reviews.title: Lovely gloves
customer_reviews.text: The gloves are beautiful! The leather is so soft and the lining warm. They fit nicely and I really like that they extend to the wrist. They make a great gift for someone or for yourself!
customer_reviews.author: Crittermum

customer_reviews.title: Great Tech Gloves!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these gloves! They are nicely fitted, not bulky as they appear in the picture. They smell good like leather. They seem to fit true to size... I ordered a 7. The fact that they have texting fingertios is great, too!!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne C.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: They look ok, and they are warm enough, but they just lack the quality I'm used to. I should have been aware - you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie S.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like that wrist on these gloves is longer than most. They are very soft, and very warm.
customer_reviews.author: Special education

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful gloves!!! They fit my strong rancher woman hands and they are warm.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Emily Blum

customer_reviews.title: These gloves were a hit for my picky mother.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my mom for Christmas and she loves them. Soft both inside and out. She's quite picky, so it says a lot of she likes them.
customer_reviews.author: LuvMyKindle

customer_reviews.title: Touchscreen quickly stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t last through one winter. Touchscreen stopped working on all fingers :-(
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Warm but don't last
customer_reviews.text: Warm and the fit is perfect. Works well with touch screens. But after one winter of normal wear, the fingertips are ruined.
customer_reviews.author: Anne-Marie

customer_reviews.title: Dye runs when wet
customer_reviews.text: Do not get these gloves wet. I bought the red ones and wore them to shove some snow. When I took them off both my hands were red from the red dye and my white down coat now has red smudges that will not come out.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Nice length
customer_reviews.text: These are a bit tight but expected to loosen after a few wears. The length is longer than traditional gloves which helps keep my wrists warm
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Quite nice.
customer_reviews.text: My wife did not expect the quality and fit for this price. Will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Pluim

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these gloves. Just what I was looking for. Great combination of warmth and style and they fit like... well, gloves! Best of all I got through the winter without losing one!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love them!! Fit as expected but really solved my problem which is long arms!! My coats generally fit when standing but when driving the arms will hike up and expose my wrists, these gloves are long enough to cover all of my skin.
customer_reviews.author: CMS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lost the pair I purchased from Nordstrom and discovered this on Amazon. Things happen for a reason.
customer_reviews.author: Cher

customer_reviews.title: Look good but smell
customer_reviews.text: They fit well and look wonderful but my hands smell when I take them off. I think it may be the cashmere. It's especially bad when they get wet.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Burke

customer_reviews.title: Please repeat beautiful gloves but they fit too snug
customer_reviews.text: Please repeat beautiful gloves but they fit too snug. The sizes run a little small, so if you’re ordering for yourself order one size up
customer_reviews.author: Sus

customer_reviews.title: Nice Color!
customer_reviews.text: These gloves fit nicely, and, are a long length to go under the coat cuffs.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: Nice gloves
customer_reviews.text: nice gloves, nice fit but the color is off. Not a true bright red.
customer_reviews.author: lmBrooklyn, NY

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful gloves!!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful & warm cashmere lined leather gloves for a great price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Barden Maffei

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty gloves that fit nicely and match my new coat perfectly. Haven't worn them outside yet so hopefully they are warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are lovely if not defective
customer_reviews.text: There was no thumb hole in the cashmere liner in the right glove so returned 😩. The leather looked really nice but unless I chopped off my thumb they were unusable
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Lawler

customer_reviews.title: Cute, classy
customer_reviews.text: Nice look, a little on small side and not as long as expected. Idk yet how warm they will be
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: These are terrible gloves. The size came stretched out and they weren't in new condition.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia B

customer_reviews.title: They were a gift
customer_reviews.text: She put them on immediately and started saying what she could wear them with. She was very pleased. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was needing
customer_reviews.text: Looks and fit great for exactly what I was needing!
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: At $43 these are a steal considering my favorite high end department store is selling these full price
customer_reviews.text: At $43 these are a steal considering my favorite high end department store is selling these full price. I bought the conductive version and it works well... I'm sure these will keep me warm in freezing Seoul this winter and allow me to take photos while being cozy. They aren't as awesome as a pair of Hestra gloves (no tech fingers) I tried on, but they will do, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Love my gloves. True to size, warm, well made and the pointer finger for phones works great!
customer_reviews.author: Irish1

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Look nice but bought as a gift for someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Mingl

customer_reviews.title: There is nothing like leather gloves
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing like leather gloves! Love these! They go perfectly with my new winter coat. Good fit and excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Gottmusic

customer_reviews.title: Good length
customer_reviews.text: I'll see how warm they are later, I like the length
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jane Gresser

customer_reviews.title: XL fits like a medium
customer_reviews.text: Nice gloves but inaccurate sizing. Ordered XL what I got was more like a medium. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Nice Gloves
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. I have large hands. Downes gloves fit and wear well, and still look femmine.
customer_reviews.author: JAS

customer_reviews.title: nice, but lost touchscreen function after 2months...
customer_reviews.text: These gloves have a lovely fit, soft high quality leather, and nice insulating cashmere. But the main reason I bought these gloves was for their touch screen ability on each finger... and that went away after 2-3 months almost completely on each finger except one spot on one thumb. I don’t know if there is a way to restore capacitive touch again or maybe the seller could give me a replacement?
customer_reviews.author: Eli C

customer_reviews.title: These are good work even at -40°and still have feel through it
customer_reviews.text: Love these gloves and they are very nice even at -40° and i can still feel my wheel chair rims to push myself long enough that snow can't go down your sleeve.
customer_reviews.author: teresa wilson

product_meta.title: FOWNES Women's Cashmere Lined Lambskin Leather Gloves
product_meta.description: 100% cashmere lined gloves furnish you with warmth, softness, comfort and even luxury in winter. Made of butter soft, supple lambskin leather. Top-notch quality, nice-fitting construction and superior craftsmanship by Fownes established over 230 years in USA. Also available in men's style.
feature_bullets: UR Powered integrated conductive leather patent technology: Whole palm conductive leather for ALL FINGERS and FULL SURFACE TOUCH on sensitive electronic devices
Long classy 4-button length dress gloves in everlasting plain style. 10"-12" length varying with size
Made of butter soft and supple lambskin leather. Leather so soft you can easily close your fingers, grip things and drive
